content: I'm imposing some consistency on the way we do value set references, and I've run into an inconsistency in the existing genomics observation profile. (What's the status of that anyway?)
it has, for a value set reference - which appears to be intended to be a code system reference: http://varnomen.hgvs.org/
but the terminologies page at build.fhir.org/terminologies.html has http://www.hgvs.org/mutnomen
• but this has been replaced by http://varnomen.hgvs.org/

Yes, we should update the terminologies page. Should I log a tracker for that?

Regarding status, we are working through ballot comments on our new IG. Our new IG will have the same value set reference.
yes please create a tracker. So the observation profile... will be haromised? retired?
I have logged GF #17335. The profile will likely be retired, to be replaced with profiles as defined in our new IG. No final answer on that yet.
